Articles.Content:
I can't seem to close KerbNet now since the patch.  I'm on Xbox and cursor mode.  I know going to space center or track station would is a workaround.  Just letting u guys know about.

Edited February 28, 2018 by Xanisselis
Autocorrect mishaps
had this as well, not entirely sure what the window is telling me, but noticed there appeared to be no way to close it
Me too, kind of annoying at times.

PS4, Enhanced 1.01

I still don't know what the Kerbnet is useful for, can I earn science or snacks for discovering the mythical oddities spread throughout the Kerbal system?

...but yeah, the window won't close easily.

14 hours ago, GrouchyDevotee said:

PS4, Enhanced 1.01

I still don't know what the Kerbnet is useful for, can I earn science or snacks for discovering the mythical oddities spread throughout the Kerbal system?

...but yeah, the window won't close easily.

Kerbnet show you bioms with the right probcore and Let u put waypoints, pretty Handy for Setting routes for rovers or just to Keep Track of witch bioms u already visited. It also show u Locations of eastereggs with a questionmark.

And u can close it like every other paw by Pressing Squarebuttom when Not aiming at a Part and u r Not in mapview, at least for the radial sheme on ps (havent tried since patch)

Now i have tried, unable to Close since 1.1

Edited March 2, 2018 by PrvDancer85

7 hours ago, PrvDancer85 said:

Now i have tried, unable to Close since 1.1

Yep.

Found by accident: 

When kerbnet is Open Press r1+Trianglebutton then circlebutton, this closes kerbnet

Works for radial and cursor

Edited March 4, 2018 by PrvDancer85
